name: M-37 Falcon
notes: Instead of making a ranged weapon attack, the target makes a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + DEX modifier). Do not add your DEX modifier to a Double Tap attack. If you are proficient with Assault Rifles, add your proficiency bonus to the DC. On a failed save, the target takes 1d8 thunder damage, or half as much on a successful one.
